short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Block distractions and establish a daily routine of solving LeetCode questions by solving at least one LeetCode question a day.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
LeetCode Habit Builder is a productivity-focused Chrome extension designed to cultivate a daily habit of solving LeetCode questions. By blocking access to all websites exception leetcode.com, it encourages users to stay focused and dedicate time to level up their problem solving skills. The extension operates on a simple yet effective principle: solve at least one LeetCode question each day to regain access to other websites. 

Key Features:
1. Focused Learning: LeetCode Habit Builder creates a distraction-free environment by restricting access to distracting websites, fostering a concentrated space for coding practice. 
2. Daily Challenge: Users are challenged to solve at least one LeetCode question each day. Upon completion, the extension will lift the website restrictions. 
3. Habit Building: By making problem solving a daily habit, LeetCode Habit Builder helps users stay consistent in their learning and interview preparation journey, enhancing problem-solving skills and boosting confidence. 
4. Customizable Settings: Users have the flexibility to set their own schedules with number of daily LeetCode questions to solve, encouraging a personalized approach to learning and adaptability to different schedules. 

Why Install LeetCode Habit Builder? 
* Skill Development: LeetCode is a renowned platform for honing problem solving skills. LeetCode Habit Builder ensures that users allocate time daily to practice and improve, contributing to continuous skill development. 
* Discipline and Consistency: Building a habit of daily problem-solving requires discipline and consistency. LeetCode Habit Builder acts as a supportive tool in fostering these qualities, helping users achieve their goals. 
* Achievement Unlocks: The sense of accomplishment from solving daily LeetCode questions not only unblocks websites but also provides a tangible measure of progress and achievement. 

How It Works: 
1. Users install LeetCode Habit Builder. 
2. Upon installation, the extension blocks access to websites other than leetcode.com. 
3. Go to Settings and enter your LeetCode ID which can be found on leetcode.com. 
4. Users set a daily goal by customizing the number of daily LeetCode questions and set schedule in the Settings. 
5. Once all questions are completed for the day, LeetCode Habit Builder automatically unblocks other websites for the remainder of the day. 

Install LeetCode Habit Builder today and turn your web browsing time into a productive problem solving session. Make it a daily habit and achieve your goal!
